title: 自己做的客户端经常崩溃，求助
author: LoeGamingJoker
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  HFTransformer ([丰收物语]Harvest-Festival-1.10.2-0.5.25-.jar)
  TANLoadingPlugin ([意志坚定]ToughAsNails-1.9.4-1.1.1.55-universal--四季.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Daisy, daisy...

replies.author: 木守
replies.txt_content: MOD太多了吧？？导致内存不足，一般崩溃都这样

replies.author: TRCRedstoner
replies.txt_content: 把报错里面的这几个mod删掉试试看
就是mod错误，可能你mod版本和服务器版本不一样，你把那些mod删掉，然后在做一个，然后在加跟你客户端版本匹配的mod

replies.author: yuan_kun
replies.txt_content:
MOD冲突   ([丰收物语]Harvest-Festival-1.10.2-0.5.25-.jar)
 ([意志坚定]ToughAsNails-1.9.4-1.1.1.55-universal--四季.jar)
删掉其中一个试试
或者两个都删掉
